      LeetCode 141: Linked List Cycle í’€ì´

      ğŸ“Š ê²°ê³¼

      • ì†Œìš”ì‹œê°„: 5ë¶„
      • Runtime: 471ms
      • Memory: 44.35MB

      ğŸ’» ë‚´ ì½”ë“œ

      public class Solution {
    public boolean hasCycle(ListNode head) {
        List<ListNode> list = new ArrayList<ListNode>();
        
        while (head != null) {
            if (list.contains(head)) {
                return true;
            } else {
                list.add(head);
            }
            head = head.next;
        }
        
        return false;
    }
}

      3. ì„±ëŠ¥: 471ms

      Floydâ€™s Cycle Detection (í† ë¼ì™€ ê±°ë¶ì´)

      public class Solution {
    public boolean hasCycle(ListNode head) {
        if (head == null) return false;
        
        ListNode slow = head;
        ListNode fast = head;
        
        while (fast != null && fast.next != null) {
            slow = slow.next;
            fast = fast.next.next;
            
            if (slow == fast) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        
        return false;
    }
}

      ì›ë¦¬:

      • slow: 1ì¹¸ì”© ì´ë™
      • fast: 2ì¹¸ì”© ì´ë™
      • ìˆœí™˜ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ì–¸ì  ê°€ ë§Œë‚¨

      ì‹œê°í™”:

      ìˆœí™˜ ìˆìŒ:
[1] -> [2] -> [3] -> [4]
             â†‘          â†“
             [6] <- [5] 

slow: 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6 -> 3...
fast: 1 -> 3 -> 5 -> 3 -> 5 -> 3...
                  ë§Œë‚¨!

      HashSet ì‚¬ìš© (ì°¨ì„ ì±…)

      public class Solution {
    public boolean hasCycle(ListNode head) {
        Set<ListNode> visited = new HashSet<>();
        
        while (head != null) {
            if (!visited.add(head)) {  // O(1) ì²´í¬
                return true;
            }
            head = head.next;
        }
        
        return false;
    }
}

      ğŸ“Š ì„±ëŠ¥ ë¹„êµ

      ë°©ë²• ì‹œê°„ ê³µê°„ Runtime
      ArrayList O(nÂ²) O(n) 471ms
      HashSet O(n) O(n) 4ms
      Two Pointer O(n) O(1) 0ms

      ğŸ¯ ê°œì„  í›„ ì½”ë“œ

      public class Solution {
    public boolean hasCycle(ListNode head) {
        if (head == null) return false;
        
        ListNode slow = head;
        ListNode fast = head;
        
        while (fast != null && fast.next != null) {
            slow = slow.next;
            fast = fast.next.next;
            
            if (slow == fast) {
                return true;
            }
        }
        
        return false;
    }
}

      ê°œì„ : 471ms â†’ 0ms, O(n) ê³µê°„ â†’ O(1)

      ğŸ’¡ í•µì‹¬

      Cycle ê°ì§€ = Floydâ€™s Algorithm

      • Two Pointer (ëŠë¦°/ë¹ ë¥¸)
      • ìˆœí™˜ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ë°˜ë“œì‹œ ë§Œë‚¨
